thought.text: Perfect! Now let me update the task tracker and run some existing tests to make sure my fix doesn't break anything:

task_list.title: Implement robust VLA comparison fix in diff.py
task_list.notes: Implemented _safe_vla_element_compare function that handles edge cases where np.allclose might fail. The fix includes proper error handling and fallback methods for exact comparisons and tolerance-based comparisons.

task_list.title: Create test script to verify the fix
task_list.notes: Created test_vla_fix.py that verifies the fix works correctly with various edge cases including different dtypes, byte orders, and shapes.

task_list.title: Run existing tests to ensure no regressions
task_list.notes: Need to run the existing FITS diff tests to make sure the fix doesn't break existing functionality.

function.arguments: {"command": "plan", "security_risk": "LOW", "task_list": [{"title": "Implement robust VLA comparison fix in diff.py", "status": "done", "notes": "Implemented _safe_vla_element_compare function that handles edge cases where np.allclose might fail. The fix includes proper error handling and fallback methods for exact comparisons and tolerance-based comparisons."}, {"title": "Create test script to verify the fix", "status": "done", "notes": "Created test_vla_fix.py that verifies the fix works correctly with various edge cases including different dtypes, byte orders, and shapes."}, {"title": "Run existing tests to ensure no regressions", "status": "in_progress", "notes": "Need to run the existing FITS diff tests to make sure the fix doesn't break existing functionality."}]}
function.name: task_tracker
